import React, { Component } from 'react'; // import './index.css' export default class Dashboard extends Component { render() { const CALORIE = localStorage.Calorie; const PROTEIN = localStorage.Protein; const FAT = localStorage.Fat; const CARBOHYDRATE = localStorage.Carbohydrate; //Recipe const recipeR = localStorage.recipeR || 0; const recipeP = localStorage.recipeP || 0; const recipeF = localStorage.recipeF || 0; const recipeC = localStorage.recipeC || 0; //Picture Match const pictureN = localStorage.pictureN; const pictureR = localStorage.pictureR || 0; const pictureP = localStorage.pictureP || 0; const pictureF = localStorage.pictureF || 0; const pictureC = localStorage.pictureC || 0; //Calelater const RR = Number(recipeR) + Number(pictureR); const PP = Number(recipeP) + Number(pictureP); const FF = Number(recipeF) + Number(pictureF); const CC = Number(recipeC) + Number(pictureC); const RRR = Number(RR)/Number(CALORIE); const PPP = Number(PP)/Number(PROTEIN); return (
{/* First Line */}
Nutrition Count(/g){recipeR}
{RR.toFixed(0)}/{CALORIE}
Calorie
{PP.toFixed(0)}/{PROTEIN}
Protein
{FF.toFixed(0)}/{FAT}
Fat
{CC.toFixed(0)}/{CARBOHYDRATE}
Carbohydrate
Get Data
{/* Second Line */}
Calendar View Today
Sat, Nov 25 2020
Create
{/* */} {/* */} {/* */}
Time Name Calories Protein Fat CarbohydratesW Status
17.00 {recipeR} Calories Recipe {recipeR} {recipeP} {recipeF} {recipeC}€
Active
17.00 {pictureN} {pictureR} {pictureP} {pictureF} {pictureC}€
Active
); } }
